title: Monday High School Football Scores & Highlights - 10/5/15
text:
Monday High School Football Scores & Highlights - 10/5/15 - NBC29 WVIR Charlottesville, VA News, Sports and Weather Member Center: Monday High School Football Scores & Highlights - 10/5/15 Posted: Sophomore Shavonn Ellis had an 80 yard punt return for a TD against Albemarle CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va (WVIR) - 
Orange County 20, Albemarle 16 (At Monticello HS)Monticello 30, Charlottesville 12Western Albemarle 59, Powhatan 35Louisa County 62, Fluvanna County 6 Sign Up for Email Alerts 
Sign up to receive NBC29 news and weather updates in your inbox daily. Email Address * Thank you for signing up! You will receive a confirmation email shortly. Local Sports Headlines Local Sports Headlines More>> Monday, October 5 2015 11:00 PM EDT 2015-10-06 03:00:39 GMT Sophomore Shavonn Ellis had an 80 yard punt return for a TD against Albemarle High School Football scores and highlights from across Central Virginia on Monday, October 5th. Full Story High School Football scores and highlights from across Central Virginia on Monday, October 5th. Full Story Updated: Monday, October 5 2015 4:25 PM EDT 2015-10-05 20:25:54 GMT The UVa football team plays its ACC opener at Pittsburgh Saturday at 12:30pm in a game you can watch on NBC29.The guys on the UVa football team say today that they're upbeat and not looking back. Full Story The UVa football team plays its ACC opener at Pittsburgh Saturday at 12:30pm in a game you can watch on NBC29.The guys on the UVa football team say today that they're upbeat and not looking back. Full Story Monday, October 5 2015 1:23 PM EDT 2015-10-05 17:23:10 GMT Mike London announces three early enrollees to UVa On Monday the UVa football team announced that five players will miss the rest of the season with injuries. Virginia announced that three high school football recruits will enroll early at Virginia in January and take part in spring practice. Virginia announced that three high school football recruits will enroll early at Virginia in January and take part in spring practice. Full Story
